summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4020 for the improvement of Holly Street, from Rainier Avenue to Seward Park Avenue by constructing sewers together with the necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 48698, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
